name: Kotive Workflow Shortcode
author: Kotive

sections.description:
Embed Kotive workflows and forms using a special short code [kotive]. The shortcode is automatically generated in the Kotive Designer and it’s best to copy it from the Workflow’s settings.

Example:
[kotive groupId=”190″ taskflowHash=”1800e4ed80cb489381fff178f5dd4247″ height=”450″]
sections.installation: For manual installation: copy the folder “kotive_shortcode” into the /wp-content/plugins/ folder. Then go to the Plugins area of the Admin and activate. Otherwise, search for “Kotive Workflow Shortcode” from the admin area of your WordPress site in Plugins > Add New.
sections.faq:
What is Kotive?

Kotive is a webapp that enables anybody to build, share & run workflows for your business or life. You know your business best. Now you can create your own workflows or business processes to fit your business like a glove.

Why is this useful?

Shortcodes are clean! You can already copy and paste JavaScript or iframe code to embed a Kotive workflow or form onto a WordPress page, but you need to make sure to be in the “HTML” tab of the writing area. If a user is in the “Visual” (default) tab, the embed code will not work. Shortcodes will work either way.

short_description: Use a special shortcode [kotive] to embed Kotive workflows and forms.
